sn56.15:4.1: “Dhāretha no tumhe, bhikkhave, mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.15:4.2: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn56.15:4.3: “ahaṃ kho, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.15:4.4: “Yathā kathaṃ pana tvaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti?
sn56.15:4.5: “Dukkhaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi;
sn56.15:4.6: dukkhasamudayaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā dutiyaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi;
sn56.15:4.7: dukkhanirodhaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā tatiyaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi;
sn56.15:4.8: dukkhanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ dhāremi.
sn56.15:4.9: Evaṃ khvāhaṃ, bhante, dhāremi bhagavatā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānī”ti.
sn56.15:5.2: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, bhikkhu, dhāresi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
sn56.15:5.3: Dukkhaṃ kho, bhikkhu, mayā paṭhamaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi;
sn56.15:5.4: dukkhasamudayaṃ kho, bhikkhu, mayā dutiyaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi;
sn56.15:5.5: dukkhanirodhaṃ kho, bhikkhu, mayā tatiyaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi;
sn56.15:5.6: dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā kho, bhikkhu, mayā catutthaṃ ariyasaccaṃ desitaṃ, tathā naṃ dhārehi.
sn56.15:5.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, dhārehi mayā cattāri ariyasaccāni desitānīti.
